entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
